long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The riix Password Generator is a extension developed to allow users to quickly create secure passwords containing numbers, letters, & symbols that can vary a length chosen by the user. Throughout our daily lives we have encountered many times a day where we either have to generate or reset a secure password. 

By providing a user with 3 different generated passwords per click users can hopefully have a more streamlined selection process without having to continually re-click the generate button as well as save users valuable time when trying to create a secure password.
